mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM noti_board

SELECT * FROM (SELECT noti_num, noti_title, noti_content, noti_date, noti_hit, manager_id, rownum rnum FROM (select * from noti_board ORDER BY noti_num DESC)) WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end} ORDER BY noti_num DESC
SELECT * FROM noti_board WHERE noti_num = #{noti_num}
mapper.update: UPDATE noti_board SET noti_hit = noti_hit + 1 WHERE noti_num = #{noti_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO noti_board (noti_num, noti_title, noti_content, noti_date, noti_hit, manager_id) VALUES(noti_board_seq.NEXTVAL, #{noti_title}, #{noti_content}, #{noti_date}, 0, #{manager_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE noti_board SET noti_title=#{noti_title}, noti_content=#{noti_content} WHERE noti_num=#{noti_num}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM noti_board ORDER BY noti_num DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM meeting_list WHERE group_num = #{group_num}
SELECT * FROM meeting_list WHERE group_num=#{group_num} ORDER BY meeting_date ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT meeting_num, meeting_title, meeting_detail, meeting_loc, meeting_date, group_num, meeting_cost, meeting_pernum, loc_detail, rownum rnum FROM (select * from meeting_list ORDER BY meeting_date ASC) WHERE group_num=#{group_num}) WHERE rnum >= #{start} AND rnum <= #{end} ORDER BY meeting_date ASC
SELECT * FROM meeting_list WHERE meeting_num=#{num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting_list (meeting_num, meeting_title, meeting_detail, meeting_loc, meeting_date, group_num, meeting_cost, meeting_pernum, loc_detail) VALUES(meeting_list_seq.NEXTVAL, #{meeting_title}, #{meeting_detail}, #{meeting_loc}, #{meeting_date}, #{group_num}, #{meeting_cost}, #{meeting_pernum}, #{loc_detail})
mapper.update: UPDATE meeting_list SET meeting_title=#{meeting_title}, meeting_detail=#{meeting_detail}, meeting_loc=#{meeting_loc}, meeting_date=#{meeting_date}, meeting_cost=#{meeting_cost}, meeting_pernum=#{meeting_pernum} WHERE meeting_num=#{meeting_num}

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM present_per_list WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id} AND meeting_num = #{meeting_num}
